# Identity Function

> Identity function.


<!-- <usage> -->

## Usage

``` javascript
var identity = require( '@stdlib/utils/identity' );
```

#### identity( x )

Returns `x`.

``` javascript
var v = identity( 3.14 );
// returns 3.14

var input = [];
var output = identity( input );
var bool = ( input === output );
// returns true
```

<!-- </usage> -->


<!-- <examples> -->

## Examples

``` javascript
var identity = require( '@stdlib/utils/identity' );

var v = identity( 3.14 );
// returns 3.14

v = identity( true );
// return true

v = identity( null );
// returns null

v = identity( undefined );
// returns undefined

v = identity();
// returns undefined
```

<!-- </examples> -->
